column1: Little Goat Diner////Service can be hectic and a miss at times
column2: even during the week - it's an eclectic clientele list of white collared professionals
column3: stay at home moms dining with their verbose 2-month old kids
column4: and hipsters and students alike.  But why rush when you've got a cozy
column5: bright environment to laze about in.  Tinned ceillings
column7: windows that go on for days
column8: and just fantastic people watching all around.
